amendment.description: Amendment reduces funds for the General Administration Account for the Department of Veterans Affairs by $10.5 million and increases funds for the General Operating Expenses, Veterans Benefits Administration Account by $10 million for the purpose of reducing the VA disability claims backlog.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce available funds for the General Administration Account for the Department of Veterans Affairs by $10.5 million and increase available funds for the General Operating Expenses, Veterans Benefits Administration Account by $10 million for the purpose of reducing the VA disability claims backlog.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Costa amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Costa.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Costa amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
